ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
ygData.msgSnippet: My god trading a tomhawk for a claw?! WTF is that. I could never trade my tomhawk for a claw. The market isn t flooded with em on Solusek Ro, but a tommy for a
ygData.messageBody:
My god trading a tomhawk for a claw?! WTF is that. I could never trade
my tomhawk for a claw. The market isn't flooded with em on Solusek Ro,
but a tommy for a demon claw is something that wouldn't happen here. I
can't even find a worthwhile trade for my tommy anywhere on antonica.
Anychance the guy who you traded with has a seperate character on
Solusek Ro I could trade with, cause I'd be VERY happy to do business.

Talonus DuPrey
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro

CMai wrote:
>
> From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
> No it is not worth 500pp. It is worth about 300pp. This is the coolest
> weapon in the game for a bard. Yesterday I traded my Tomahawk for the claw
> and I was doing more dmg than before because with Anthem and Warsong I was
> hitting with non stop. To also answer earlier question as to which weapon
> is better: Tomahawk or Barbed whip? Neither. I would get a tomahawk then
> trade it for the claw. One, it looks cool and it is a lot lighter than a
> Tomahawk and a lot faster too. For a bard, speed is everything in this
> game. I hoped this help.
>
> Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
> Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
> Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: lankyak@... [mailto:lankyak@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 2:33 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
>
> From: lankyak@...
>
> Anyways, is a demon claw worth 500 pp? It's a dam 5 delay 19 weapon and
> comes off the Avatar of Fear in Cazic.
> I don't want to shell out my entire bank just because it's the loot of a
> high level creature.
>
> Level 30 bard
> Povar
